title: *Please Ignore*
body:
I'm posting this so my level will be updated and i can comment, sorry for wasting your time...

If you stumbled upon this post please enjoy this stolen meme: [When you flame a blitz and he starts playing well.](https://imgur.com/a/V87dh)

replies.body:
-see's please ignore and gets heckin' curious- 

Glad to see you got that level synced up. For future refence, there's a post sticked at the top with a tool to sync your profile if you ever need to again!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ywAsOKZF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-06T00:35:36.302+0000)
>
> -see's please ignore and gets heckin' curious- 
> 
> Glad to see you got that level synced up. For future refence, there's a post sticked at the top with a tool to sync your profile if you ever need to again!

the wild Broporo in his natural habitat
